function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of citizen engagement in governance processes","Impact":"Ineffective governance and decision-making, leading to suboptimal policies and strategies","Mitigation":"Implement tools and platforms to facilitate citizen engagement and participation in governance processes","Technologies":"E-participation platforms, citizen sensing technologies","People":"Citizens, residents","Owner":"Local governments, urban institutions"},{"Description":"Risk of disease propagation through collaborative strategies and citizen engagement","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases spreading in the built environment due to extensive citizen interaction and collaboration","Mitigation":"Introduce health and safety protocols, raise awareness about disease prevention, and implement public health measures","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, public health communication platforms","People":"Citizens, residents, stakeholders involved in collaborative strategies","Owner":"Public health authorities, local governments, urban institutions"},{"Description":"Overwhelmed local governments and institutions","Impact":"Inability to effectively address complex problems and challenges in the built environment, leading to potential public health risks","Mitigation":"Strengthen collaboration between local governments, institutions, and citizens, develop shared responsibility frameworks for problem-solving","Technologies":"Collaborative governance platforms, problem-solving tools, communication networks","People":"Local government officials, institutions, citizens, stakeholders","Owner":"Local governments, urban institutions"}]}
